keywordspec.name: Example
keywordspec.doc:
Library for `libdoc.py` testing purposes.
This library is only used in an example and it doesn't do anything useful.

kw.name: Keyword
kw.doc:
Takes one `arg` and *does nothing* with it.
Example: | Your Keyword | xxx | | Your Keyword | yyy |
See `My Keyword` for no more information.

kw.name: My Keyword
kw.doc: Does nothing & <doc> has "stuff" to 'escape'!! and ignored indentation Tags: in spec these wont become tags
